intro: This document outlines the IT architecture principles and implementation guidelines for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS), overseen by the European Environment Agency (EEA). It establishes a framework for developing consistent, scalable, secure, and maintainable IT solutions within the CLMS programme. Emphasising modularity, reproducibility, transparency, and resilience, these guidelines are designed to ensure that IT deliverables are coherent, adaptable, and efficiently operated, supporting the overarching IT vision and strategy of CLMS.
